lcInstruction.p: The <learningSummary> topic type contains review materials. This topic provides a review of the content and puts it in perspective with your learning objectives. This topic can also include instructions on what to do next.

In a <learningSummary> topic, the main body element is the <learningSummarybody>. The <learningSummarybody> element can contain the following elements:
<lcSummary> summary of the learned goals
<lcObjectives> completed objectives
<lcReview> review of the main content
<lcNextSteps> directions for after the course
<lcResources> related information to the course
These elements may be followed by an unlimited number of <section> elements.
Here is an example of a <learningSummarybody>:
lcInstruction.pre:
pre from "../LearningDITA/en-us/Learning_and_training_specialization/samples/ls_l3_t1_summary.dita"

To summarize the overview of Feeders and Waterers:

  • The height of the feeders and waterers is important to the ducks’ development.
  • Feeders and waterers must be kept as clean as possible at all times.
  • Feeder and waterer space is important for the development of ducklings.
  • Ducks’ attraction to water can lead to wet litter problems.
